1320: A. The limit of liability shown in the Declarations for this coverage is our maximum limit of liability for each person injured in any one accident. This is the most we will pay regardless of the number of: 1. "Insureds"; 2. Claims made; 3. Vehicles or premiums shown in the Declarations; or 4. Vehicles involved in the accident.
1321: B. No one will be entitled to receive duplicate payments for the same elements of loss under this coverage and: 1. Part A or Part C of this policy; or 2. Any Underinsured Motorists Coverage provided by this policy..
